videos.headline: A. Reid runs for 5-yard TD
videos.description: Albert Reid run for 5 yds for a TD

videos.headline: James Conner runs over a Virginia defender
videos.description: James Conner takes the handoff and decides to go straight through a Virginia defender, turning the hunted into the hunter as he picks up a first down.

videos.headline: Pittsburgh WR spins out of tackle for 38-yard score
videos.description: Pittsburgh WR Jester Weah catches a pass and showcases his athleticism spinning out of the tackle of a Virginia defender leading to a 38-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: T. Mizzell run for 44 yds for a TD
videos.description: Taquan Mizzell run for 44 yds for a TD

videos.headline: Henderson zigs and zags for electrifying 93-yard kickoff return TD
videos.description: After Virginia scores to take the lead, Quadree Henderson goes left before cutting back to the right side of the field, going 93 yards to the house tying the game back up for Pitt.

videos.headline: Virginia retakes the lead with 74-yard TD
videos.description: After Pittsburgh tied the game off a 93-yard kickoff return, Virginia QB Kurt Benkert fires a 74-yard touchdown stirke to Olamide Zaccheaus, giving the Cavaliers the lead back.

videos.headline: Conner leaps for 1-yard touchdown
videos.description: James Conner jumps over the line to score a 1-yard touchdown that evens Pittsburgh and Virginia up at 21.

videos.headline: A. Reid runs for 1-yard TD
videos.description: Albert Reid run for 1 yard for a TD

videos.headline: Pitt almost takes another kickoff to the house
videos.description: Dylan Sims kickoff for 60 yds, Rafael Araujo-Lopes return for 69 yds to the Virg 26

videos.headline: Conner finds end zone for second time vs. Virgina
videos.description: Pittsburgh RB James Conner runs up the gut a yard into the end zone for his second score of the day.

videos.headline: Shovel pass helps Pitt extend lead
videos.description: Nathan Peterman pass complete to George Aston for 5 yds for a TD

videos.headline: Conner lines up at defensive end and pressures Virginia QB
videos.description: Pitt RB James Conner lines up at defensive end and gets pressure on the Virginia QB
